snippet: A new wave of attacks and killings has engulfed parts of the Central African Republic, Doctors Without Borders reported Wednesday.
abstract: Doctors Without Borders reports that new wave of attacks and killings has engulfed parts of the Central African Republic; organization is one of the few international aid providers that has remained in the country, which has descended into near-total chaos in the past half year.
lead_paragraph: A new wave of attacks and killings has engulfed parts of the Central African Republic, Doctors Without Borders reported Wednesday.

headline.main: Central African Republic: Group Reports New Deadly Attacks
headline.print_headline: Central African Republic: Group Reports New Deadly Attacks
